text: Pedro Cachín was the defending champion but lost in the semifinals to Casper Ruud. Ruud won the title after defeating Taro Daniel 6–3, 6–4 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ===Bottom half=== ==References== *Main Draw *Qualifying Draw Category:Copa Sevilla singles Copa Sevilla - Singles
title: 2016 Copa Sevilla – Singles
